title: Relates to certain motor vehicle requirements for the registration of motor vehicle title
summary: Relates to certain motor vehicle requirements for the registration of motor vehicle title; provides that the commissioner of motor vehicles, as part of the motor vehicle registration renewal process, shall notify affected motor vehicle owners about such new title requirements.
